Uses of Interface
com.samysadi.acs.core.event.Event

  • Packages that use Event 
    Package Description
    com.samysadi.acs.core
    This package contains core classes and interfaces of the simulator.
    com.samysadi.acs.core.event  
    com.samysadi.acs.core.notifications  
    com.samysadi.acs.utility.factory
    This package contains definitions for different factories.

    • Uses of Event in com.samysadi.acs.core

      Methods in com.samysadi.acs.core with parameters of type Event 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Simulator.cancel(Event event)
      Cancels the given event, and removes it from this simulator's event queue.
      void Simulator.schedule(Event event)
      Schedules the given event to be processed at the current simulator time (Simulator.getTime()).
      void Simulator.schedule(long delay, Event event)
      Schedules the given event to be processed after that the given delay has passed.
      In other words, schedules the given event to be processed at Simulator.getTime() + delay.

    • Uses of Event in com.samysadi.acs.core.event

      Subinterfaces of Event in com.samysadi.acs.core.event 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  DispensableEvent
      Dispensable events can, unlike other events, be ignored by the simulator if there are only dispensable events remaining in the simulator queue.
      In other words, simulation can be stopped if only dispensable events remain in the simulator's events queue.
      Classes in com.samysadi.acs.core.event that implement Event 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DispensableEventChain 
      class  DispensableEventImpl 
      class  EventChain
      This class extends the Event class and can be used if you want to schedule multiple events at a given moment of the simulation, and make sure that each event is processed before the next event is scheduled.
      class  EventImpl 
      Methods in com.samysadi.acs.core.event that return Event 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Event Event.clone()

      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  FailuresFactory.FailureEvent
      An event that is scheduled to generate a failure.
      static interface  FailuresFactory.FailureRepairEvent
